alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 4:09AM EDT until May 03 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River At Vestal. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Cellars flood on Argonne Drive in Endwell. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 20.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
